description:
The lightweight Nano 14 is ready to take on any adventure, from a hike on the local trails to a exploring the street markets of Europe. A low-profile packable design makes it easy to stuff inside your checked luggage, then deploy at your destination.

  • Made of lightweight yet abrasion-resistant 210-denier nylon ripstop with an extra-durable 420-denier high-density nylon base panel
  • Perforated foam harness for a comfortable carry without excess weight and bulk
  • Quick-access drawcord opening keeps things simple
  • Zippered front pocket has a key clip
  • Universal hydration hanger with secure buckle closure
  • Reflective webbing loops secure water bottles or other gear
name: Gregory Nano Backpack - Unisex
